---
title: "Welcome!"
---

It is a three-hour course on how to use **Git** and **GitHub** to collaboratively develop open source software with the R language. It's organize for the [Champions program](https://ropensci.org/champions/) of [rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/).

Please visit the ["Preparation"](preparation.html) section to follow the instructions to install git and setup everything you'll need for the course.
